name: blastoisinite
effect: Held: Allows Blastoise to Mega Evolve into Mega Blastoise.
short_effect: Held: Allows Blastoise to Mega Evolve into Mega Blastoise.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Blastoise hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
